      private void showProgramInfo()
      Shows user information about the program This dialog needs to have more information added
      private void showRegisterDialog​(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
      This shows a window prompting the user to input their information for registration Registration window asks for first name, last name, profile name, email, password and retyping of password Registration window also has a checkbox for credit transfering, which if chosen, will allow users to transfer their accumulated credits from the unregistered profile to their new one, if their accumulated credits are over 100.
      void showRegistrationErrorDatabase()
      Shows error message with registration if there was an error with saving the information to database
      void showRegistrationErrorEmailAlreadyExists()
      Shows error message with registration if email is allready in use
      void showRegistrationErrorEmptyFields()
      Shows error message with registration if one or more of required fields are empty
      void showRegistrationErrorPasswordsNotMatch()

      • showRegisterDialog

        private void showRegisterDialog​(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
        This shows a window prompting the user to input their information for registration Registration window asks for first name, last name, profile name, email, password and retyping of password Registration window also has a checkbox for credit transfering, which if chosen, will allow users to transfer their accumulated credits from the unregistered profile to their new one, if their accumulated credits are over 100.
        Parameters:
        primaryStage - this variable is used to link the new stage to the primaryStage

      • showPlayerInfoDialog

        private void showPlayerInfoDialog​(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
        This shows a window showing users their information and lets them change password and user name The window shows players name, registration date, email, profile name and password replaced by asterisks. After changing password and user name, a save button needs to be pressed before information is updated to database
        Parameters:
        primaryStage - this variable is used to link the new stage to the primaryStage

        settingsScene - Settings view
        statsScene - Stats view

      • setImagesOnClick

        private void setImagesOnClick​(javafx.scene.layout.StackPane pane,
                              javafx.scene.image.ImageView img,
                              int index)
        Custom onClick handler for card image containers. Handles events where card is clicked, places lock image to container when clicked first time and removes it if repeated. If image is locked, adds image index to cardsToSwapIndexes list.
        Parameters:
        img - ImageView image of the card
        index - int card index, helps to determine which card is clicked.
        pane - StackPane card image container.

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

      • setScore

        public void setScore​(java.lang.String score)
        Display game score in view. If hand is win, creates green border around cards. Sets the win also in gamble section without letters, and creates win notifcation for user. In case of loss, lowering opacity of the cards.
        Specified by:
        setScore in interface ViewIF
        Parameters:
        score - string game score.

      • fillStatistics

        private void fillStatistics​(java.lang.String count)
        This method fills all tabs with data from database using pull methods.
        Parameters:
